I still wonder about that. I bet the reason our songs had too much taunt
power until recently was that they fixed the EFFECT so that it only
affected
the group (when they fixed the bug) but they forgot to fix the fact that
npc's could detect it

have a greater "taunt" than they should.

I wonder if that is what they fixed which seems to have so dramatically
reduced our taunt? Just a hunch...
